questions.text: What was the shocking truth about Teddy?
questions.explanation: Teddy was actually Andrew Laeddis, a patient who murdered his wife after she drowned their three children, and the investigation was an experimental therapy.
Rachel Solando was a fabrication - an anagram of Teddy's wife's name (Rachel = Laeddis). She was actually Teddy himself.
Teddy's real name was Andrew Laeddis, and he was a patient who had created the 'Teddy Daniels' persona after his traumatic past.

questions.text: What did Teddy choose at the end?
options: He accepted his truth and chose the lobotomy
questions.explanation: Teddy chose to have a lobotomy rather than live with the painful truth that he had murdered his wife after she killed their children.
